profile:
Service You Can Depend On
At Brella Electric we pride ourselves on providing our clients with quality work the first time. Our skilled and experienced electricians are knowledgeable and driven to provide service our clients are satisfied with. Please allow us to assist you with all your electrical needs and contact us today for a free estimate. 

Fair & Competitive Pricing
We pride ourselves on offering our clients fair pricing on our services. We are passionate about building trusted relationships with our clients and guarantee that they are being provided quality work at an affordable rate. 

Free At Home
Consultations
Before providing an estimate a member of our team will visit your location free of charge to discuss and plan up coming services.

Warranty 
We guarantee quality service with the utmost confidence. With this we offer our clients a 3 year warranty on all electrical services provided. If something needs to be fixed in this term we come back and fix it free of charge. 

Licensed & Insured
We are licensed/insured with the Electrical Safety Authority and WSIB,

profile:
Serving the GTA and Niagara areas
Power Aid Electric will make your electrical needs simple and easy. 
With over 20 years of experience in the electrical trade our team has developed a network of satisfied customers that continuously call us back when needed. If you are planning a project and are requiring an expert, please call for advise and a free quote. 

Power Aid Electric is licensed and insured for all electrical work. We are also a Licensed Electrical Contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority ECRA/ESA #7005584

Some of the specialty services we are called upon frequently but are not limited too include
-   LED lighting upgrades and retrofitting
-   Pool / Hot tub wiring and lighting
-   Electrical upgrades to home renovations 
-   Residential and Commercial back up power systems
-   Residential and Commercial troubleshooting
-   Service upgrades 
-   3 Phase installations
-   Conduit construction

Our clientele are seen as partners therefore our Installations are always done with the long term needs taken in consideration.

profile:
Kraun Electric is a full-service electrical contractor. We provide residential electrical service to customers throughout Niagara, Hamilton, and Burlington. Our skilled team of friendly, licensed electricians are ready to help you will all your electrical needs, including new installations (including new builds), upgrades, repairs, or renovations. At Kraun, we ALWAYS answer the phone during regular business hours and are available 24/7 for electrical emergencies. We arrive on-time and provide flat-rate pricing so there are no surprises. In many cases, we can deliver the quote and do the work on the same day. 

We work hard every day to ensure our customers are satisfied and we are continually working to improve. We appreciate your business and we can't wait to serve you.

Kraun also has a commercial service and construction division.
